description: Create a user and add an SSH key using OpenConfig system model.

password.description: Password for the user (cleartext or hash). Either password or ssh_key must be provided.

ssh_key.description: SSH public key to add for the user. Either password or ssh_key must be provided.

role.description: Role for the user (required by OpenConfig AAA model). Common values: 'SYSTEM_ROLE_ADMIN' (OpenConfig standard), 'network-admin', 'network-operator'. Use 'bolt task run hal::discover_roles' to find available roles on your device.
